subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: This time, the gap is wide at the Masters tournament, with the 96-player field comprising 41 Americans and 55 golfers from other countries, including the defending champion, Trevor Immelman of South Africa.
snippet: This time, the gap is wide at the Masters tournament, with the 96-player field comprising 41 Americans and 55 golfers from other countries, including the defending champion, Trevor Immelman of South Africa.
